column4: I am locked out of Synaptic in Ubuntu 8.10 because I set a password for it and don't know what it is now. Please help!
I am locked out of Synaptic in Ubuntu 8.10 because I set a password for it and don't know what it is now. Please help!
its the same as your login password
#ubuntu-eeepc and #eeepc will be be able to help you out
